verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Nipo katikati ya Mbingu na ardhi,
ninaning'inia sina pa kushika.
Duniani sipo na mbinguni sipo,
ninawayawaya Bwana niokoe.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Nikienda huku,
mambo motomoto,
nikirudi kule, ni baridi tupu
mbele yangu giza,
nyuma yangu giza,
mahubiri mengi
yananiyumbisha imani.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
Kumtafuta Mwokozi,
ee Mungu uko wapi
ili nije kwako hima,
mbele yangu kuna giza nene
na nyuma yangu ni giza
mahubiri mengi yamezidi
na mengine yananiyumbisha
imani, imani.

verse.name: c4
verse.lines:
Nikienda huku ninabatizwa,
lakini nikirudi kule
ninaitwa mimi kafiri
giza pande zote,
mahubiri ni mengi,
na mengine yananiyumbisha
imani imani.

verse.name: c5
verse.lines:
Nikienda huku ni moto,
nikirudi huku baridi,
vuguvugu haitakiwi
na imani yangu yayumba
Mungu wangu nisaidie
niokoe nisipotee
mahubiri mengi na mengine
yananiyumbisha imani.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Roho yangu Bwana inakutamani,
wewe peke yako ndiwe tiba yangu
neno lako Bwana litaniponya.
Rudi Bwana Yesu njoo kwetu hima
ulimwengu huu, ulioufia
umekuwa jela ya maskini.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Manabii wengi wananiyumbisha
nimfuate yupi, nimuache yupi
wapo wa uongo, wapo wa kwei
kwa sababu wewe, Mungu ni mmoja
twakuomba Baba utuunganishe
matabaka yote na yatoweke.
